name: lambda-microservice-template
description: Template for microservice using lambda / typescript / serverless

scripts.build: rm -Rf dst && tsc && cd src && find . -name '*.json' -type f -exec cp {} ../dst/{} \; && cd ..
scripts.pack: rm -f dst.zip && cp package.json dst/package.json && cd dst && npm install --cache=./.npm --production && zip -r ../dst.zip . ** && cd ..
scripts.pretest: rm -Rf dst && tsc -p ./tsconfig.test.json && cd src && find . -name '*.json' -type f -exec cp {} ../dst/{} \; && cd ..
scripts.deploy: npm run pretest && npm run pack && serverless deploy

author: Kurt Lee
